page.title: 20DOMESDAY ACTIVITIES
page.content: Included in our Domesday Project activities was a traffic survey in which we surveyed the number of private cars and commercial vehicles travelling along Burnley Road during school hours. Various field trips were undertaken including visits to the Friends Meeting House, the Manchester Diocesan Conference Centre, St. Johns Church, the Ski Slope, Marl Pits Sports Centre and a coach trip throughout our D-BLOCK. An environmental survey was carried out along the stretch of Burnley Road running through Crawshawbooth. An amenity index was compiled that showed the limited services and the need for people to travel to nearby towns and cities. Outside speakers visited the school to assist the children with the project.
